attributes.action: DEMAND that Dimitri continues to serve his fine mobile cuisine to the people of Harrold!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dimitri has been serving the people of Harrold the finest Kebabs & Burgers in the land for almost 15 years. 

Dimitri and his van are as much a part of the village as the Buttermarket & Lock-Up on The Village Green.

He is an institution in the village and a fundamental part of the dietary needs of the people of Harrold.

Food aside, Dimitri is a man of the people and treats everybody the same: From the old-skool villagers to the nouveau riche Redrow Home types that have recently landed. He makes no discrimination.

Please, please Prime Minister force this 'bubble & squeak' to keep serving his demanding village people!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
